message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IOT, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG 

The paper discusses the use of Computer Vision in the context of the Internet of Things (IoT) to detect people in pictures captured by IP cameras for improving security in smart cities, smart towns, and smart homes. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also discusses the use of IoT, which makes cs.IOT (Internet of Things) a likely category as well. The paper also discusses security, which makes cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) a possible category. The paper proposes the use of automation and semi-automation, which makes cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) possible categories as well.
